page.title: 03Beaches near Dinas, Dyfed
page.content: There are several beaches near {Dinas,}the most popular being {PWLLGWAELOD }and {CWM-YR-EGLWYS }. In English {CWM-YR-EGLWYS }means 'Valley of the church'. It is known by that name because there is a church which was destroyed in 1850 by a very fierce storm and there is only the West wall left standing now . {PWLLGWAELOD} has a very interesting history as well.About 250 years ago there was a little inn which was popular with smugglers but it doesn't happen now(?). Another beach nearby,{ABERBACH } is very pebbly.There is a little hill on the beach from which you can see a very beautiful view - other little hills and the sun setting on the sea. {Alison Phillips
